One of my absolute favorite cars of all time. It always has reminded me of an arrow in a way. The lines and the curves seem created specifically to shoot through the air. As all classic Ferraris have been, it is an amazing combination of beautiful design and cutting edge engineering. In an age where form almost always follows function, it is refreshing to see a vehicle that focuses on both, with stunning results.
